welcome_message_body: Welcome to Downey, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful parks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Downey has to offer during your visit!

restaurants.name: Porto's Bakery and Cafe
restaurants.description: Porto's Bakery and Cafe is a cuban restaurant located in Downey.
restaurants.address: 8233 Firestone Blvd (at Downey Ave.), Downey, CA 90241

restaurants.name: Chick-fil-A
restaurants.description: Chick-fil-A is a fast food restaurant located in Downey.

restaurants.description: In-N-Out Burger is a fast food restaurant located in Downey.
restaurants.address: 8767 Firestone Blvd (at Lakewood Blvd), Downey, CA 90241

restaurants.name: Lock & Key Social Drinkery
restaurants.description: Lock & Key Social Drinkery is a restaurant located in Downey.

restaurants.name: The Habit Burger Grill
restaurants.description: The Habit Burger Grill is a burger joint located in Downey.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Municipal Airport provides customs and immigration services for international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing top-of-the-line amenities and services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a strong and reliable connection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The smallest of LAX's terminals, primarily used by Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines, including Aeromexico and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Home to Virgin America and some domestic flights for Delta.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: LAX's largest and newest terminal, serving many international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Mainly used by American Airlines for domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Primarily used by Delta for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: Serves domestic flights for various airlines, including Alaska and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Mainly used by United Airlines for domestic and some international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Home to United Airlines and some domestic flights for Alaska and American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require re-connection in different terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Monica Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at John Wayne Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at John Wayne Airport, mainly serving regional flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal where all flights depart and arrive.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available in all public areas of the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Van Nuys Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport offers a cozy and convenient experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
